commands.name: az network vpn-gateway create
commands.syntax:
az network vpn-gateway create --name
                              --resource-group
                              [--asn]
                              [--bgp-peering-address]
                              [--location]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--peer-weight]
                              [--scale-unit]
                              [--tags]
                              [--vhub]
examples: az network vpn-gateway create -n MyVPNGateway -g MyRG --vhub MyVHub -l westus

commands.name: az network vpn-gateway delete
commands.syntax:
az network vpn-gateway delete [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
examples: az network vpn-gateway delete -n MyVPNGateway -g MyRG

commands.name: az network vpn-gateway show
commands.summary: Get the details of a site-to-site VPN gateway.
examples: az network vpn-gateway show -n MyVPNGateway -g MyRG

commands.name: az network vpn-gateway update
commands.summary: Update settings of a site-to-site VPN gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vpn-gateway update [--add]
                              [--asn]
                              [--bgp-peering-address]
                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--peer-weight]
                              [--remove]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--scale-unit]
                              [--set]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--tags]
                              [--vhub]
examples: az network vpn-gateway create -g MyRG --vhub MyVHub --name MyVPNGateway --tags foo=bar

commands.name: az network vpn-gateway wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
